alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 7:37PM MDT until August 10 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Bon Homme County in southeastern South Dakota... Western Yankton County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 837 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tabor, or 10 miles east of Tyndall, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Tabor and Utica around 840 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lesterville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
